```python
import pygitx
from pathlib import Path

repo = pygitx.open_repo(Path("path_to_repo"))

# Show HEAD and resolve a branch/tag/short oid
head = repo.head()
print("HEAD:", head.id if head else "None")
print("main ->", repo.rev_parse("main"))

# List the last 5 commits with author/message
for c in repo.list_commits(max=5):
    print(f"{c.id[:7]} {c.author}: {c.summary}")

# Reword an older commit on the current branch (linear history only)
# (replace abc123 with the commit you want to reword)
target = repo.rev_parse("HEAD~2")
result = repo.reword(target, "Refine API error handling")
print("Reworded mapping:", {k[:7]: v[:7] for k, v in result.old_to_new.items()})
print("Updated refs:", {k: v[:7] for k, v in result.updated_refs.items()})

# Keep only src/**/*.rs across history (drops other paths)
kept = repo.keep_path("src/**/*.rs")
print("Kept-only-Rust mapping:", {k[:7]: v[:7] for k, v in kept.old_to_new.items()})

# Backup refs before a rewrite
backup_root = repo.create_backup_ref()
print("Backups at:", backup_root)
```

Demo websiteï¼š[https://voiceailabs.com/](https://voiceailabs.com/)

## Voice AI Labs Introduction
Voice AI Labs is a professional AI voice cloning platform that offers high-fidelity voice cloning, text-to-speech, and voice conversion services. With advanced technology supporting over 30 languages and real-time processing, users can create their own AI voice characters easily. The platform emphasizes data security and privacy, ensuring that user-generated content remains protected.

## Voice AI Labs Features

### High-Fidelity Voice Clone
Voice AI Labs utilizes cutting-edge deep learning models to achieve 99% similarity in voice cloning, producing voices that are nearly indistinguishable from real human voices.

### Global Multilingual Support
The platform supports over 30 languages, including English, Chinese, Japanese, and German, making it suitable for diverse multilingual voice cloning and text-to-speech applications.

### Ultra-Low Latency API
Developers can access easy-to-use APIs that provide real-time responses, facilitating seamless integration into various applications and services.

### Instant Voice Cloning
Users can upload a short audio clip to clone a high-quality voice in real-time, streamlining the voice creation process.

### Professional Text Dubbing
The text-to-speech feature offers rich emotional control with adjustable speed and pitch, enhancing the quality of audio outputs.

### Accurate Voice Conversion
The platform allows users to perfectly replicate the original speaker's tone, pauses, and emotions while changing the voice timbre.

### Voice Square Community
A community-shared library of high-quality voice models is available, enabling users to utilize or share their creative voices easily.

## Voice AI Labs How to Use?
Select or clone a voice from Voice Square or upload 1-5 minutes of audio/video to create your unique AI voice.
Input text for text-to-speech or upload an original audio clip for voice conversion.
Click generate to obtain high-quality audio files in seconds, which can be listened to online or downloaded.

## Voice AI Labs Q&A

### What is AI Voice Cloning?
AI voice cloning is a technology that allows users to create a digital replica of a human voice, enabling various applications such as dubbing, voiceovers, and more.

### What is Voice Square?
Voice Square is a community-shared library within Voice AI Labs where users can access and share high-quality voice models.

### Do you provide API services?
Yes, Voice AI Labs offers a full-featured RESTful API that covers all core functionalities for easy integration into products.

### Can I use the online recording feature?
Yes, users can record directly in the browser for voice cloning or conversion without needing additional software.

### Can generated voices be used commercially?
Yes, the voices generated by Voice AI Labs can be used commercially without restrictions.

### What languages are supported?
Voice AI Labs supports over 30 languages, making it versatile for global users.

### Is my voice data secure?
Yes, Voice AI Labs prioritizes data security, encrypting all voice data and ensuring that only the user can access it.

title: aivideogenerator.asia
content:
# Sora 2 AI - Product Hunt Launch



ç½‘å€ï¼šhttps://aivideogenerator.asia/
## Tagline
**Turn your imagination into stunning 4K videos with AI**

## One-liner
Sora 2 AI transforms text descriptions into professional-quality videos in seconds â€” no editing skills required.

---

## Description

### The Problem
Creating professional videos traditionally requires expensive software, technical expertise, and hours of editing. Most creators struggle to bring their ideas to life because the barrier to entry is too high.

### The Solution
Sora 2 AI democratizes video creation. Simply describe what you want to see, and our AI generates cinema-quality videos in seconds. From creative shorts to product demos, social media content to artistic expressions â€” if you can imagine it, Sora 2 AI can create it.

### Key Features

**Smart Prompt Assistant**
Our AI understands natural language. Describe your vision in your own words, and watch it come to life. No complex prompts needed.

**4K Ultra HD Quality**
Every frame is rendered in stunning 4K resolution. Crystal-clear output that rivals professional production studios.

**Lightning-Fast Generation**
Generate videos in seconds, not hours. Your creativity delivered instantly, so you can iterate and experiment freely.

**AI Audio Sync**
Automatically match music, dialogue, and sound effects. Your videos come alive with perfectly synchronized audio.

**Cinematic Multi-Shot Control**
Professional camera movements, seamless scene transitions, and dynamic angles â€” all handled automatically by AI.

**One-Click Remix**
See a video you love? Click "Make Similar" to create your own version with a single click. Learn from the community and build on great ideas.

---

## What Makes Us Different

### Community Showcase Gallery
Browse 50+ curated AI video examples from creators worldwide. Each showcase includes the original prompt, so you can learn what makes great AI videos and recreate them instantly.

**Featured viral creations:**
- Mario's Escape (1.48M views) â€” Police bodycam footage of Mario evading arrest
- Saving Private Pikachu (4.4M views) â€” Iconic war movie scene reimagined with Pikachu
- Einstein UFC Interview (61K views) â€” The physicist explains his fighting technique

### Multi-language Support
Full support for English, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean. Create in your native language.

---

## Pricing

| Plan | Price | Credits | Best For |
|------|-------|---------|----------|
| Starter | $9.9/mo | 200 | Trying AI video generation |
| Basic | $23.9/mo | 1,000 | Individual creators |
| Standard | $34.9/mo | 4,000 | Professional creators |
| Pro | $49.9/mo | 8,000 | Enterprise teams |

**One-time packages also available** â€” no subscription required.

---

## Target Audience

- **Content Creators** â€” YouTubers, TikTokers, Instagram creators looking to produce more content faster
- **Marketers** â€” Product demos, ad creatives, social media content at scale
- **Educators** â€” Engaging visual content for courses and presentations
- **Artists & Filmmakers** â€” Prototype ideas, create mood boards, explore concepts
- **Small Businesses** â€” Professional video content without the agency cost

---

## Launch Offer

**First 100 users get 50% off any annual plan**

Use code: `LAUNCH50`

---

## Links

- **Website:** https://aivideogenerator.asia
- **Showcase Gallery:** https://aivideogenerator.asia/showcase
- **Pricing:** https://aivideogenerator.asia/pricing

---

## Maker's Story

We built Sora 2 AI because we believe everyone deserves to tell their story visually. Video is the most powerful medium for communication, but it's been locked behind expensive tools and steep learning curves.

With advances in AI, we saw an opportunity to change that. Now, a solo creator with a great idea can produce content that competes with professional studios.

We're excited to share what we've built and can't wait to see what you create.

---

## First Comment (for Product Hunt)

Hey Product Hunt!

We're thrilled to launch Sora 2 AI today â€” the fastest way to turn your ideas into stunning videos.

**Why we built this:**
We noticed creators spending 80% of their time on technical editing rather than creative thinking. We wanted to flip that ratio.

**What you can do:**
1. Describe any scene in natural language
2. Get a 4K video in seconds
3. Iterate until it's perfect

**Special for PH community:**
- Use code `LAUNCH50` for 50% off annual plans
- First 100 users only

We'd love to hear your feedback! What kind of videos would you create?

---

## Social Media Posts

### Twitter/X

```
ğŸ¬ Launching today: Sora 2 AI

Turn text into 4K videos in seconds.

No editing skills needed. No expensive software. Just describe what you want.

âœ¨ Smart prompts
âš¡ Lightning fast
ğŸ¥ Cinema quality

Try free â†’ aivideogenerator.asia
```

### LinkedIn

```
Excited to announce the launch of Sora 2 AI!

We're making professional video creation accessible to everyone.

The problem: Creating videos traditionally requires expensive software, technical skills, and hours of work.

Our solution: Describe what you want in natural language. Get a professional 4K video in seconds.

Key features:
â€¢ Smart Prompt Assistant â€” AI understands natural language
â€¢ 4K Ultra HD output â€” Every frame is cinema quality
â€¢ Lightning-fast generation â€” Seconds, not hours
â€¢ Community Showcase â€” Learn from 50+ viral examples

Whether you're a content creator, marketer, educator, or business owner â€” you can now create professional videos without the learning curve.

Check it out: aivideogenerator.asia

#AI #VideoCreation #ContentCreation #Startup #ProductLaunch
```

---

## Press Kit Assets Needed

- [ ] Logo (PNG, SVG)
- [ ] Product screenshots (1280x800)
- [ ] Demo video (60 seconds)
- [ ] Founder photos
- [ ] Brand guidelines

---

## FAQ for Launch

**Q: How many credits does one video use?**
A: Typically 10-50 credits depending on length and resolution.

**Q: Can I use the videos commercially?**
A: Yes! All paid plans include commercial license.

**Q: What languages are supported?**
A: Full interface in English, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean. Prompts work in any language.

**Q: Is there a free trial?**
A: New users get free credits to try the platform.

**Q: How long are the generated videos?**
A: Currently up to 20 seconds per generation. You can combine multiple clips.

## DeepAcquire æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆä¸åŒï¼Ÿ

**DeepAcquire** æ—¨åœ¨æˆä¸º **â€œè¯­è¨€å­¦ä¹ ç•Œçš„ Cursorâ€**ã€‚å°±åƒ Cursor é€šè¿‡å°† AI æ·±åº¦é›†æˆåˆ°å·¥ä½œæµä¸­æ”¹å˜äº†æˆ‘ä»¬å†™ä»£ç çš„æ–¹å¼ä¸€æ ·ï¼ŒDeepAcquire é€šè¿‡å°† AI é›†æˆåˆ°å†…å®¹æ¶ˆè´¹ä¸­æ¥æ”¹å˜æˆ‘ä»¬å­¦ä¹ è¯­è¨€çš„æ–¹å¼ã€‚
![DeepAcquire](https://deepacquire.com/_astro/hero.D30nN0oi.png)


### 1. AI ä¼˜åŒ–å­—å¹• (AI-Refined Subtitles)

æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸åªæ˜¯æ˜¾ç¤º YouTube æä¾›çš„åŸç”Ÿå­—å¹•ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨ AI æ¥æ”¹è¿›åŸå§‹çš„è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆå­—å¹•ã€‚DeepAcquire ä¼šçº æ­£æ ‡ç‚¹ç¬¦å·ã€ä¿®å¤æ–­å¥é”™è¯¯ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›æ¯”é»˜è®¤å­—å¹•æ›´å¹²å‡€ã€æ›´æ˜“è¯»çš„å­—å¹•ä½“éªŒã€‚

### 2. è‡ªé€‚åº”è§£é‡Š (Adaptive Explanations)

è¿™æ˜¯â€œAI-Firstâ€ç†å¿µå¤§æ”¾å¼‚å½©çš„åœ°æ–¹ã€‚AI ä¼šæ ¹æ® **å…·ä½“çš„è§†é¢‘è¯­å¢ƒ** å’Œ **ä½ å½“å‰çš„ç†Ÿç»ƒç¨‹åº¦** æ¥è§£é‡Šè¯æ±‡ã€‚

- **å¯¹äºåˆå­¦è€…ï¼š** å®ƒä½¿ç”¨ç®€å•çš„è¯æ±‡æ¥è§£é‡Šæ¦‚å¿µã€‚
- **å¯¹äºé«˜é˜¶å­¦ä¹ è€…ï¼š** å®ƒä¼šæä¾›ç»†å¾®å·®åˆ«çš„è®²è§£å’Œä¸ä½ æ—¥å¸¸ç”Ÿæ´»ç›¸å…³çš„ä¾‹å¥ã€‚

### 3. æ·±åº¦é—®ç­” (Deep Dives & Q&A)

è¿™æ˜¯æœ€å…³é”®çš„å·®åˆ«ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä¸è§†é¢‘â€œèŠå¤©â€ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ï¼š

- è¢«ä¸¤ä¸ªé•¿å¾—å¾ˆåƒçš„å•è¯ææ··äº†ï¼Ÿ

- æˆ–è€…å¾ˆéš¾åŒºåˆ†ä¸¤ç»„è¿‘ä¹‰è¯æœ‰å•¥ç»†å¾®å·®åˆ«ï¼Ÿ

ä½ æ— éœ€ç¦»å¼€è§†é¢‘æ²‰æµ¸ç¯å¢ƒï¼ŒDeepAcquire å·²èƒ½æ„ŸçŸ¥åˆ°ä½ æ­£åœ¨è§‚çœ‹çš„è§†é¢‘ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»ä¸€ä¸‹å°±èƒ½å³æ—¶è·å¾—ç²¾å‡†ã€ç»“åˆè¯­å¢ƒçš„è®²è§£å’Œåˆ†æï¼Œè¿˜èƒ½åŒæ­¥åˆ°ä½ çš„ç”Ÿè¯æœ¬ï¼Œéšæ—¶å¤ä¹ å·©å›ºã€‚

### 4. æƒ…å¢ƒåŒ–å›å¿† (Contextual Recall)

å¤ä¹ å•è¯æ—¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸åªæ˜¯æ˜¾ç¤ºâ€œå•è¯ -> æ¯è¯­å«ä¹‰â€ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šä¿å­˜ä½ ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡é‡åˆ°è¯¥å•è¯çš„ **ç¡®åˆ‡åœºæ™¯å’Œè¯­å¢ƒ**ã€‚è¿™èƒ½å¸®åŠ©ä½ å›å¿†èµ·é‚£ä¸ªâ€œç¬é—´â€ï¼Œè®©è®°å¿†æ¯”æœºæ¢°çš„å®šä¹‰æ›´ç‰¢å›ºã€‚
